member.name: T:Savanna.CreateBarcode
member.summary: Provides access to the Savanna barcode creation APIs.

member.name: M:Savanna.CreateBarcode.CreateAsync(Savanna.Symbology,System.String,System.Int32,Savanna.Rotation,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a barcode from the text provided and returns a PNG image
member.param: The barcode symbology.

The data or text to include in the generated barcode. Usually an error will occur when the barcode symbology cannot support the text provided. Different symbology allow for numbers only, or alpha-numeric, or uppercase alphabets, and some restrict characters. For example: code39 only accepts numbers and uppercase letters.
Sets both the x-axis and the y-axis scaling factors. Must be an integer > 0. Use if you want default X & Y, just different size. short.
Rotates the barcode in 90 degree increments.

Allows for the data included in the barcode to be printed in human readable form with the barcode (usually printed text under the linear barcode, this setting is ignored for many 2D symbologies such as qrcode).

member.name: M:Savanna.CreateBarcode.CreateAsync(Savanna.Symbology,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,Savanna.Rotation,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a barcode from the text provided and returns a PNG image
member.param: The barcode symbology.

The data or text to include in the generated barcode. Usually an error will occur when the barcode symbology cannot support the text provided. Different symbology allow for numbers only, or alpha-numeric, or uppercase alphabets, and some restrict characters. For example: code39 only accepts numbers and uppercase letters.

Sets the x-axis. Must be an integer > 0. Use with scaleY, if using scale only, leave scaleX & scaleY blank. Allows proportional changes to the resulting barcode, helpful with linear barcodes to make tall or short.
Sets the y-axis scaling factors. Must be an integer > 0. Use with scaleX.
Rotates the barcode in 90 degree increments.

Allows for the data included in the barcode to be printed in human readable form with the barcode (usually printed text under the linear barcode, this setting is ignored for many 2D symbologies such as qrcode).

member.name: T:Savanna.FDARecall
member.summary: Provides access to the Savanna FDA Recall APIs.

member.name: M:Savanna.FDARecall.DeviceSearchAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns medical device recall notices for a given description
member.param: A simple one word search string
Maximum number of records to return
member.returns: A containing results from the device recall search, if any

member.name: M:Savanna.FDARecall.DrugSearchAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns drug recall notices for a given description
member.param: A simple one word search string
Maximum number of records to return
member.returns: A containing results from the drug recall search, if any

member.name: M:Savanna.FDARecall.FoodUpcAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns food recall notices for a given UPC code
member.param: A valid UPC code for a food item
Maximum number of records to return (maximum 99)
member.returns: A containing results from the food recall lookup, if any

member.name: M:Savanna.FDARecall.DrugUpcAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns FDA drug recall notices for a UPC code
member.param: Value
Maximum number of records to return
member.returns: A containing results from the drug recall lookup, if any

member.name: M:Savanna.FDARecall.DeserializeDeviceSearchAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns medical device recall notices for a given description
member.param: A simple one word search string
Maximum number of records to return
member.returns: A containing results from the device recall search, if any

member.name: M:Savanna.FDARecall.DeserializeDrugSearchAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns drug recall notices for a given description
member.param: A simple one word search string
Maximum number of records to return
member.returns: A containing results from the drug recall search, if any

member.name: M:Savanna.FDARecall.DeserializeFoodUpcAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns food recall notices for a given UPC code
member.param: A valid UPC code for a food item
Maximum number of records to return (maximum 99)
member.returns: A containing results from the food recall lookup, if any

member.summary: Returns FDA drug recall notices for a UPC code
member.param: Value
Maximum number of records to return
member.returns: A containing results from the drug recall lookup, if any
